entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Freezing rain beginning early this evening then changing to ice pellets or snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
